data.text:
Â· Culver City, CA

by Geraldine Page (starring); Cliff Robertson (director, screenwriter, starring); Cristina Ferrare, R.G. Armstrong, R.L. Armstrong, John Crawford (starring)

Culver City, CA: Columbia Pictures, 1971. Vintage studio still photograph of Geraldine Page from the 1972 film.

After being released from prison, a man tries to return to his old life as a rodeo cowboy, although finds that he has missed out on the better years of his career.

Set in the American West, shot in California and Oklahoma.

8 x 10 inches. Near Fine. (Inventory #: 159212)
